DataSource.Query: WITH all_purchase AS ( SELECT inventory.stores.store_id, inventory.items.item_id, inventory.items.brand_id, inventory.brands.brand_name, SUM(inventory.checkout_details.base_quantity) AS base_quantity, inventory.checkout_details.base_unit_id, SUM(inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) AS amount FROM purchase.purchases INNER JOIN inventory.checkouts ON purchase.purchases.checkout_id = inventory.checkouts.checkout_id INNER JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON inventory.checkout_details.checkout_id = inventory.checkouts.checkout_id INNER JOIN inventory.stores ON inventory.stores.store_id = inventory.checkout_details.store_id INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = inventory.checkout_details.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.brands ON inventory.brands.brand_id = inventory.items.brand_id INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.book_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND finance.transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@StoreId, 0) = 0 OR inventory.stores.store_id = @StoreId) AND (COALESCE(@BrandId, 0) = 0 OR inventory.brands.brand_id = @BrandId) GROUP BY inventory.stores.store_id, inventory.items.item_id, inventory.checkout_details.base_unit_id, inventory.items.brand_id, inventory.brands.brand_name ) SELECT inventory.stores.store_name, all_purchase.brand_name, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, inventory.convert_unit(all_purchase.base_unit_id, inventory.items.unit_id) * all_purchase.base_quantity AS quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, all_purchase.amount FROM all_purchase INNER JOIN inventory.stores ON inventory.stores.store_id = all_purchase.store_id INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = all_purchase.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON inventory.units.unit_id = inventory.items.unit_id;
